overview: Frustrated husbands are down in the dumps with married life. Marriage is challenging enough, but imagine being stuck in a marriage knowing deep inside you're ready to break free. Icon Male presents Gay Divorcees featuring the hottest newly divorced studs, ready to dive in to the world of hot men and sexual freedom while exploring their deepest and wildest fantasies. Starring; Austin Chapman, D. Arclyte, Cade Maddox, Michael Roman and Billy Santoro. Written and directed by Nica Noelle this is a release you won't want to miss!
title: Gay Divorcees
